docTitle.titlePart:
Eine nicht erwartete intramolekulare
Photoreaktion eines
HexacbJoroctahydrodimethanonaphthalins

front.note:
An Unexpected Intramolecular Photoreaction
of a Hexachlorooctahydrodimethano-
naphthaline

byline.affiliation:
Institut für Ökologische Chemie der Gesell-
schaft für Strahlen-und Umweltforschung mbH

front.div:
Photoreactions of
1,2,3,4,10,10-hexachloro-
6,7-epoxy-l,4,4a,5,6,7,8,8a-octahydro-l,4-endo,
endo-5,8-dimethano-naphthaline (1) were stud-
ied in acetone with wavelengths above 290 nm.
With the help of column chromatography an
unusual isomerisation product (4) could be
isolated, whose structure was established by
spectral data obtained by mass spectrometry
infrared spectroscopy, X H and 13 C nuclear
magnetic resonance measurements.
Hexachloroctahydrodimethanonaphthahne gehö -
ren zu den bekanntesten Cyclodieninsektiziden,
